description:
Amber is a character that uses Physical and Elemental Burst to defeat her foes. This playstyle enables her to create two distinct DPS builds:
> Physical Build
> Pyro Build
Despite the fact that both of these builds are capable of doing massive amounts of damage, the Pyro build comes out on top owing to her elemental damage. With that in mind, here's how to get the maximum damage out of your Pyro DPS build.
title: Amber | Playstyle
